description:
“If you do not know how to care for money, money will stay away from you" Warren Buffett

“The number one problem in today's generation and economy is the lack of financial literacy" Alan Greenspan

“Academic qualifications are important and so is financial education. They are both important and schools are forgetting one of them" Robert Kiyosaki

Do you want to improve your financial literacy?

Do you want to understand what forms interest rates and mortgage payments?

Are you someone who would like to make their own decisions?

If so, then this is the right course for you!

It's a short and practical course that will lay the foundation of your financial literacy:

·Understand the time value of money

·Learn about the components that form interest rates

·Make the distinction between fixed and variable interest rates

·Understand how to negotiate with banks when applying for a loan

·Compare present and future cash flows

·Assess whether a project is feasible from a financial perspective through the Net Present Value technique

·Learn about annuities

·Calculate a complete loan schedule with fixed payments

·Know how to convert Foreign exchange currencies

·See the core principle behind the modern Equity Portfolio Management theory

·Be able to make your own financial decisions based on sufficient financial literacy

Learn the subtleties of finance from someone who has strong expertise in the field. Leap well ahead on the learning curve and make a truly positive difference in your life!

The instructor of this course has extensive experience in the world of finance:

·Worked for several years within the retail and private banking units of a large commercial bank

·Experience working with retail and corporate clients, as well as high-net-worth individuals

What we offer:

Well-designed and easy-to-understand materials

Detailed explanations with comprehensible Case Studies based on real-life situations

Downloadable course materials

Regular course updates

NEW! Includes the calculation of a complete loan schedule, very similar to those prepared by banks before offering you a loan

By the completion of this course you will:

·Know what forms interest rates

·Be in a better position to negotiate with a lender and obtain financing

·Understand how a bank evaluates default risk

·Know the difference between present and future cash flows

·Learn how to discount future cash flows

·Apply the Net Present Value technique in order to compare different projects

·Know how to calculate the fixed monthly payment for a 5, 10 or 20 year loan

·See how easy it is to convert foreign currencies

·Understand why diversification is one of the most common techniques used by portfolio managers

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

About the course:

·An unconditional Udemy 30-day money-back guarantee – because we believe in the quality of our content

·No significant previous experience is needed in order to understand the course well and fully benefit from its content

·Unlimited access to all course materials

·Emphasis on learning by doing

·You can always contact us for any clarification completely free of charge

·Our goal is to take your financial literacy skills to the next level

Make an investment that will be highly rewarded in terms of career prospects, financial success and personal growth.

This course is particularly suitable for people who want to learn how to manage their own money. Do not rely on others to make important choices on your behalf. Acquire the tools that will allow you to make the confident decisions required to be independent and successful!

People with basic algebra knowledge who go through the course will dramatically increase their financial literacy.

So what are you waiting for? Just go ahead and subscribe to this course! If you don't acquire these skills now, you will miss an opportunity to separate yourself from the others. Don't risk your future success! Let's start learning together!
title: Finance 101: Financial Skills for the Real World
